website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's Blu-ray player is an incredible bargain — it handles the basics with ease, comes with streaming video apps, and even supports Dolby TrueHD audio.
pros: Samsung's "AllShare" technology makes it easy to send content from your digital devices to your screen
Built-in apps are easy to use, and upscaling makes DVDs and older content look incredible
cons: some users report WiFi functionality can be finicky

customer_reviews.title: This blu-ray player was a great price, wonderful picture
customer_reviews.text: This blu-ray player was a great price, wonderful picture...my only downside is that there are no operational buttons or indicators on the front at all. There is no way to know when it is turned on or off; and if the remote is not around, no way to even start up a DVD. Otherwise very good
customer_reviews.author: Larry L.

customer_reviews.title: No lights to know that it is not on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a DVD player that died. There are no lights so I never know if it is on, just that it is unresponsive. At times, it does not turn on and the only way to get it to work is to unplug it, wait for 1 minute and then plug it back in.
customer_reviews.author: C V

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I am not what you would call ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I am not what you would call technologically adept or current. I bought it so I could watch Blu-ray discs, but because it is Wi-Fi-enabled, I am now able to watch streamed Netflix shows on my TV. I had been watching them on my laptop, but this is soooo much better! And it was very easy to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product in such a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: Take it out of the box, plug it in, attach the video cable, the wireless is fault free..... zap, your done. Flawless operation, great product in such a small footprint!! Would give 6 stars if I could....
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: No light
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, there is no visible on-off light which is annoying. Otherwise it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Probst

customer_reviews.title: Less Sensitive Antenne
customer_reviews.text: The Biu-Ray Antenna is appears to be less sensitive then my older Blu-Ray. My router has covered the entire house since installing it. This Player was set up at the far end of the house and couldn't maintain streaming on-line programs. I replaced it with my older Blu-Ray and that works fine. I then moved this unit to where it is closer to the router. It now is working fine and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Has been working fine. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Has been working fine. Easy to install, and have been watching NETFLIX and Amazon Prime, Blu-Ray and DVD disc. So far I am very satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: James A. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because didnt work. Go through setup process OK (language, wifi, etc) then put in a dvd, any dvd, spins and spins and just blank screen. Did it turn itself off?, A problem with a cable?, dunno, hard to troubleshoot because no lights or other user-visible feedback on device itself. After trying several more dvds, unplug/replug, etc concluded its defective. Got as a replacement for a different samsung bluray that died after couple years, so this is frustrating. No more samsung blurays for me. If anybody wants to recommend different brand let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Sartorio

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under a month...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this DVD player to replace our old one, had seen its time and was overdue for an upgrade. We bought this unit in June and have used it less than 10 times. Now it won't turn on. The only way to get the unit to turn on is to unplug it from the wall and plug it back in. Any time we want to use it... now if this was a 5 year old player, ok character glitch. But on a brand new unit this is unacceptable. Better luck to anyone else who tries for a decent piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as described, had to pay return postage
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had purchased the wrong device then learned it should have played regular DVDs--I should have known something was wrong when there was no initial set-up as with other devices. I had to pay return postage, and should not have. I will not purchase from this seller again--I believe I did not receive a new device as advertised. I will be wary of buying electronics from Amazon and this seller. I buy a lot of stuff from Amazon and I'm disappointed with this purchase and having to pay for return postage.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great Player
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good player. I love it because it doesn't take up much space and does a really great job.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing player and great price
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing for the price. Our old blu-ray player broke and we needed a good one that would get her fast and allow us to still access Netflix and Amazon, etc. It’s so much smaller than our old one which is great and it’s easy to install. I had more trouble with my internet provider and getting the WiFi connected than anything. Spent 35 min on the phone with them and it was their settings. Nothing to do with the player. I would buy this product again if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Alysmom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work !
customer_reviews.text: 5 days past the return date I discovered that this player will not play DVDs - so I'm stuck with it and I got Sc_ _ _ _ d ! Not a happy camper at all .
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like all the pandora, netflix and Amazon app on here. Great DVD player. worth the purchace
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy It
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for six months. Now it does nothing. I have chatted and emailed Samsung dozens of times about getting it repaired. No such luck.
customer_reviews.author: Rusian B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It was great until then but extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only a month of use. It was great until then but extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: went couple weeks to use the product and to my disappointment the product is not working
customer_reviews.text: bought this item with high anticipation of all the different components in one,recieved the package and it worked with no problem,went couple weeks to use the product and to my disappointment the product is not working,a true let down,the first product i ever ordered from amazon which turned out to fail,genuine as could be!
customer_reviews.author: Sean L. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I had one just like it a few years ago and it worked fine
customer_reviews.text: Very basic, low-end starter box, maybe. Having trouble with it freezing up when it needs to update the software. Only pulling the plug gets it to stop. Then, the update isn't successful. Have been using it by saying "no" to the update window when it pops up. If you're desperate and/or can't go out shopping to buy something else, then get this. I had one just like it a few years ago and it worked fine. Maybe just this machine has a problem. Who knows, it's not worth the hassle sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu-ray player, BUT!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this Blu-ray player now for two days and was very excited to get it. It has all necessary streaming apps and has a very user-friendly interface BUT! It doesn’t connect to the wi-fi right away, if it does at all, nor will it remember the security key for the wi-fi so, more often than not I have to open the network settings and manually connect to the wi-fi before streaming can begin. Suuuuuper annoying. I’ve had Samsung Blu-ray players before with built in wi-fi and have never had this problem before. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morales

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 2 weeks in.....could not return or get replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after our living room player stopped working, also a Samsung. This one seems to work as well as the old one. Easy setup. Only complaint is there is no indicator on it letting you know if off or on. Daughters Blu-ray also went that was bought thru Walmart, but thankfully still on their warranty plan. After getting an egift card ordered this same one off Walmart site....it was $30 cheaper even with new warranty purchased. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly  Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Has no indicator lights of any kind.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's my own fault for not paying closer attention, but this unit does not have a digital display or any lights. I was used to my last unit that showed you the time elapsed on the Blu-ray. You need to pause the movie to see how much time is left on screen. The opening and closing of the drawer is a little slow and so again without any indicator lights you aren't sure whether the unit is responding. I have had a couple of problems where a regular DVD was not recognized when place in the drawer. Otherwise it has worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Yoscary

customer_reviews.title: After many tries I gave up and I am just going to stream from my smart TV. My password works on everything else in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 3 stars because I can't connect to streaming. I was able to get my network name to show up only after going over the same things with Time Warner and Samsung people. Even with Samsung's help The DVD player would not recognize my password and would not connect me to the internet . After many tries I gave up and I am just going to stream from my smart TV. My password works on everything else in my home. I just don't get it. The DVD part works but it shuts the tv when we turn off the DVD. No Biggie.
customer_reviews.author: katherine amitrano

customer_reviews.title: Solution to two AmazonPrime Video profiles on same flat screen.
customer_reviews.text: My previous Samsung Blu-ray player was a refurbished one. I had a Samsung Smart-TV with the AmazonPrime Video app. but needed a separate profile for another member of the household with different tastes. I registered the previous device under his profile but the device had trouble streaming. I bought this new Blu-ray and solved the problem. This solution is similar to the NetFlix allowing two (or more) profiles on the same app. I also put his AmazonPrime on a different sign-on on my Windows 10 desktop. It is easier to work with the settings and selections on a PC rather than a TV.
customer_reviews.author: Linnaeus C. Shecut

customer_reviews.title: stopped working at the 120 day mark
customer_reviews.text: Was watching a blue ray, paused it to go to the bathroom. When I came back in the room I hit play and nothing happened. I tried to turn it off and turn it back on, it wouldn't turn off. I tried just to turn it off for a few minutes and finally it did. Then, it would not power back on. Tried the remote and the button, unplugging it, you name it. Had to break open the stupid thing to get the dvd out.
customer_reviews.author: Steven McClure

customer_reviews.title: Works great. There is no light to see when it ...
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Works great. There is no light to see when it is working, but it really doesn't matter, because when it is on, the TV automatically goes to HDMI 2. If it is off the TV stays on HDMI 1. Nice and small.
customer_reviews.author: "hockey_pink"

customer_reviews.title: Works great and if you match with Samsung T
customer_reviews.text: Works great and if you match with Samsung T.V. it turns the correct T.V. functions on when you use the DVD. As said by others, the only issue is that for some reason they don't have a light on the front, so you can't tell if it is powered on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this january 2019 I was excited to be able to us this with my non smart TV I use it mostly for Netflix and Amazon. After a few weeks of use the recomte control stopped working it would turn on but nothing else, I tried the DVD but nothing worked none of buttons on the control would work. I called customer service and they were quick to replace the remote control because they could not fix the issue. It has been 4 months since i got this and he remote control stopped working again!! I tried new batteries, resetting the remote or the unit nothing works. Need a new remote or new Blue ray player
customer_reviews.author: my_books

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last as long as it might
customer_reviews.text: This player is easy to use, produced clear video and works for both dvds and blu rays. It started acting up about 9 months to a year of use. Sometimes when I turned it on, everything would have a pink background, which messed up all the colors so badly that the images were unwatchable. I was able to re-set it by turning it off, or sometimes unplugging it for a while and then trying again. After two years and month, it stopped working completely.
customer_reviews.author: Lewes Martin

customer_reviews.title: WONT STAY ON!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give ZERO STARS I would!!! I didn’t set this up right away as we had just moved and I was still getting the house situated on top of being in my first trimester with baby number 2. I finally set it up and have had issues from the start. 3 uses and the damn thing won’t STAY ON!! It BARELY starts playing and just shuts off; I’ve tried multiple different dvds, in case it was something wrong with the dvd, but no, all the same and all that play fine in another rooms player. I love Samsung, but what is WRONG with this product?!?!
customer_reviews.author: W. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, 3 stars because if you lose the remote, it’s worthless. No buttons on device itself.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Not really useable. I am forced to unplug power and plug it back in each time it is powered off. There are no lights or leds to indicate if it off or on. This is a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Poletti

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Blu-ray DVD Disc Player with Built-in Wi-Fi 1080p & Full HD
customer_reviews.text: Had a long-time Phillips DVD player fall apart on me. I had become a Samsung convert (camera, phone, MP3) so I thought I would try this. The picture quality is good and I think the price is right. What I don't like is what other posters have commented is that there is no display screen on the front; i.e., no time or power button light reflected. I think the remote is unnecessarily "busy" but otherwise still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, basic yet high-end performance
customer_reviews.text: Im not a “techy” person but good at figuring these things out and this couldn’t have been easier. Took about five minutes and we have a lot of complicated junk connected with our TV. Simple to use and excellent picture. Love the sleek curve design. Only thing is, why don’t the buttons light up? We don’t have it facing the “viewing area” so it’s only slightly annoying. Good buy and no problems whatsoever. So far:)
customer_reviews.author: LadyJeanTop Contributor: Women's Fashion

customer_reviews.title: Pass by this one till redesigned
customer_reviews.text: The picture and actual functionality of this player is fine BUT the fact that it doesn’t have a power light IS THE DUMBEST OVERSIGHT EVER!!!!! In today’s home entertainment arena, when switching between inputs with different devices, it’s difficult to know if the device is on , or if the input is wrong. Put a DANG TINY LITTLE RED LIGHT ON THE FRONT.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Hudgin

customer_reviews.title: Came broken. Couldn't contact support. Couldn't return.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, so I bought it long before it was opened and used. When it was opened, we found it was dead out of the box. Was only able to turn it on once, and even that took over an hour, and as soon as we powered it off, that was the end of it. By this time, the return window had closed, so I tried to contact Samsung Customer Service. They wouldn't let me Live Chat without a Product Code, and after looking on their own website for this product's code and using it, they still insisted that product code didn't exist. Worst experience with a product and a company's service department ever.
customer_reviews.author: John Desilets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picture and sound, but...
customer_reviews.text: Flawless picture and sound and easy to set up with the home's WiFi, but only AFTER I discovered why it wouldn't communicate with the TV. I would have given this unit 5 stars across the board if it hadn't come with a defective HDMI cable. If I hadn't thought to try it with a spare cable I had in a drawer, I'd have sent the unit back as defective.
customer_reviews.author: Techwriter

customer_reviews.title: Samsung has lost Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Either this BD player is a fake, or Samsung has started producing junk. I have also switched my phone from Samsung Galaxy series to LG G8. Anyway, this player has a mind of its own, and intermittently refuses to play discs. If it was consistently doing so, I would have returned it while I could. I blamed it on the discs at the time. Now I am stuck with junk, and have to shop again.
customer_reviews.author: Raza S

customer_reviews.title: Not GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: 250+ apps? Where? What apps? None of the normal apps you would expect besides Netflix, Amazon, and Youtube. No Youtube TV. Apps from Eastern Europe or something. This seems like 10 year old technology. It is an awful product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to the internet
customer_reviews.text: The player will not connect to the internet. It finds the network and then has an IP address issue. We have reset the modem and the player. It looks like this is a common issue. When doing a Google search trying to figure it out there were numerous people with this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Quit working in 3 months. Was told warranty was ONLY for 30 days for $137.00. Waiting for shipping label to mail back to be fixed, so far it has not showed up. Returned from Samsung, will NOT connect to WIFI. Piece of junk, total rip off. NO ONE can tell me the DNS number to enter and the player WILL NOT find automatically. RIPOFF!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: not a good product! I stood by samsung but I guess I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: seemed like something was always wrong with it. it played but if you did not allow it to go through previews by it self and tried to skip them it would constantly recycle the preview of the movie until you ejected the disc. I've had it since July 7th is there anyway I could get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: craig smith sr

customer_reviews.title: Problems  on Replacement unit.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement unit having problems. One DVD would not play but played fine on another DVD player in bedroom. Next DVD locked up and had to do a hard reboot (unplug)... Very poor quality and very disappointed Amazon offers this.
customer_reviews.author: DrProctor

customer_reviews.title: Really well made player.
customer_reviews.text: A really good player with many apps available. Plays Blu-ray, as well as DVDs and other storage devices containing music, photos and videos. I recommend this player. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Superb picture with Samsung compatible tvs
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the reviews moaning about no power on light, get over it. I have a Samsung tv and it is amazing the compatibility. My tv remote works everything on the player except eject. When I move to input on my tv to the player HDMI source, the player turns on automatically so I don't need an indicator light. The setting that improves picture quality with compatible samsung TVs will blow you away. Love it, superb quality for reasonable price. Ever since I purchased my 1st Samsung 4k Wi-Fi tv, I've been a Samsung fan. Now I have the player and a Samsung S9 plus
customer_reviews.author: Dean W. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We had gone through two Sony BR players, and while the playing of discs and media from hard drive was fine, Internet streaming (Netflix, et al) was pretty dodgy. This one has done much better on that front. The UI is kind of clunky compared to the Sonys, but perhaps we just need to get used to it. Why can't anyone put a USB port on the BACK of the unit, I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Paddy

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI cable to connect player to TV
customer_reviews.text: Doggone pain to purchase electronics and not have the basic cable connectors. In this case no HDMI cable to connect the thing to the TV. More cost to purchase and more down time waiting for it to come in. BAH!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Nymeyer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Total pain in the butt. Will not connect to wifi. Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: ngah

customer_reviews.title: Wi-fi doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: While this player will serviceably play disks, the wi-fi connection simply doesn't work. Don't expect to use this to watch Netflix or anything else. Customer support was no help.
customer_reviews.author: Goozleberry

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blue ray player. I use it for Hulu and amazon prime. I agree with other reviewers that I wish there was a light to show when it was turned off or on. I have noticed that when I have tried to update the software it can crash and needs to be unplugged and plugged back in again before it will turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Ultimate Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Player
customer_reviews.text: This player has a lot of nice features on it, for one, the WIFI is nice. Also the USB is handy with viewing family photos and such. The clarity of the movies through the HDMI at 1080P is really nice. The only thing that I didn't like about it, is there is no power light to let you know the unit is on or off. I do recommend this player.
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 5 days.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this newer model, I have an older one. Worked for 5 days, and now will not do anything; will not turn on, will not reset, and won't eject my blu-ray movie. that was about a month ago. Still waiting for a return label.
customer_reviews.author: JGR

customer_reviews.title: Lost power within weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible player. Unfortunately, we used it for a few weeks & then one day in the middle of a show, it lost power. And would never power up again! It was very difficult to get the dvd out of it. And the company was less that helpful. I would look elsewhere for other options. We did like the small, sleek look & loved that it would connect to our WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Penny

customer_reviews.title: BEST ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: I own two Sony blue ray players (BD 3200) that are similar to this player and still use them. However, this player beats the Sony on every facet. The set-up takes about 1 minute and it is much faster than the Sony player. If you are looking for a blue ray player, this is the one to buy unless you are willing to pay over $ 150.00.
customer_reviews.author: B Ardell Young

customer_reviews.title: Was used.
customer_reviews.text: Good product and easy to work, HOWEVER this was NOT new!!!!!! Once I got it set up and on, I went to log into Netflix and someone else’s information was already in there....
customer_reviews.author: RSACJ6

customer_reviews.title: Don't plan on streaming with this.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst if you plan on using any of the network apps. It SUCKS!!!!! It constantly drops the wifi, you can be in the middle of watching something & just randomly drops the network. I use my 360 if I want to watch anything on streaming apps because this thing is a POS special edition.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This device does exactly what I hoped it would do. I bought it primarily to stream Amazon Prime Video and it does that well. It was easy to install and set up. It would be nice to have a small light on the front to confirm when it is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally got it to connect to internet after a week of trying. Hope it lasts. Update: This is a piece of sh@t!!!!!! Constantly looses signal, have to reset. Started with 4 stars, but buying something else tomorrow. Not from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: wolflover

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good unit, good price. Needs a power light. Hard to tell if it is on or off. Netflix and Amazon Prime software a little slow, but does work.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Strickon

customer_reviews.title: WiFi Blu-ray player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically to go with my outdoor projector so family & friends can gather for a barbecue and the kids can watch movies after dark on disk or via any wifi streaming channel you can log into! This is a great (little in size) player, easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of gear
customer_reviews.text: Good piece of gear. The only additional thing I would have liked to see is an indicator light for power.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: ... kids to have and they along with me just love it!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I'm very impressed with how it works that I bought 2 more for my kids to have and they along with me just love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Submitted A Claim on 7-18-20
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Asurion insurance for this Dvd Player. It stopped working. I followed the instruction to return it for a replacement or a refund. Claim was submitted 7-18-20. Asurion received it on 7-24-20 per tracking information. I checked for status on the website, it states it's on the way. It has been almost a month. I have not received it and they have not communicated with me about it. I just bought a printer and added Asurion insurance with it. Second guessing that choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-function Blu-ray DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This device sells for a very reasonable price. The good news is you can play dvds and other movies on thumb drives or view photos you may have saved years ago. You can also listen to music CDs. While there is no light to determine if the DVD is "on or off" , this is a minor concession for the value you get in this player. I am a very satisfied customer!!! John R. Nelson
customer_reviews.author: John R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Is it on or off?
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, but because there is no light indicating the device is on or off I must have accidentally left it on and it burned out. I think anyone who purchases this should unplug it each time.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good but the WiFi connected isn't as strong as I'd like it to be. Have to reset it a lot. At first I thought it was the room it was in, but when I try to connect through my PS4 or my Smart TV i have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Started out great...........
customer_reviews.text: This player started out great but after 3 months it started to have issues playing any discs. Then but month 6 nothing, I've tried cleaning it and still nothing. Samsung service say they cant help because its a 2015 model and i bought it in November 2018 new from amazon. Wont be buying Samsung again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Shields

customer_reviews.title: Hulu not supported any what ?!?  Boo.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the apps and streaming. And now says Hulu is not supported on this device. Reason for the purchase. Very disappointed. It was quite spendy and thought was a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable streaming capabilities
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed with the WiFi performance of this blu-ray player. It frequently says it it not connected. Sometimes it seems to help to unplug it from power and “reboot”, but most of the time it will only work after a half hour of repetitively trying to connect to different apps. Other devices in the same part of the house work fine. I recommend buyers interested in streaming look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: CNG

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it connects to my Wi-Fi i cam watch Netflix or Hulu or listen to music on Pandora
customer_reviews.author: Donette McNeil

customer_reviews.title: May not connect to Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and connected it to my TV, and it would not connect to my Wi-Fi. I turned my router on and off, reset the blu-ray player, and finally called customer service. They tried to reset it and connect it to my Wi-Fi and it would not work. They eventually told me that I would have to call my internet company. I plugged my old blu-ray player back in and it connected with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of this particular device that I’ve purchased! I already one in our living room but I needed one for my room! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KMarino916

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price, all good. The cable was a plus. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: But everything else is nice. Bought it for a family member and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Should have a power on notification light..... But everything else is nice. Bought it for a family member and they like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miss information
customer_reviews.text: No where did it say it was used shipping box was ok but when I open it the product box looked like it was pulled from a basement behind a water heater
customer_reviews.author: eesio

customer_reviews.title: It didn't seem to work with my home theater equipment ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't seem to work with my home theater equipment. Perhaps i just needed more help setting it all up?
customer_reviews.author: JUDY LELAND

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable WiFi
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job with DVDs and Blu-Rays. However, its network connections are very spotty. WiFi is very unreliable. The last time I hooked it directly to ethernet, it took three attempts to get a correction.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This unit allowed us to reduce the number of devices needed to meet all of our streaming needs and to provide us with the ability to play CDs/DVDs/Blueray Discs. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after two months
customer_reviews.text: After less than two months of owning it, the player stopped working after a manufacturer software update. Prior to that, it would take several minutes to remove a "does not find a connection" window - even though it was connected. Will try to seek resolution with Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: The unit does NOT have a power light and the remote works sometime. I am returning mine for a model later than this 2015 model.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while but died
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on June 5, 2018. Stopped working. Won't even power on. Does Samsung monitor this feed for these problems? I took a chance. It worked for a while, but is dead a year and a half later.
customer_reviews.author: D.C. Claymore

customer_reviews.title: Broken only after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this DVD Player for less than 4 months and we are already having issues with it. The controller doesn’t always work, we can’t choose the option we want on the main menu. Very frustrating considering the short time we’ve had it and we aren’t able to return it any longer!!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Berry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program and hook up to television
customer_reviews.text: Easy to program and hook up to television. Works well. The only downside is that there is no light to indicate if it is turned on or not
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Samsung DVD players
customer_reviews.text: All the Samsung players from 2012 -18 operating system is not compatible with Hulu, so you will not have access to Hulu if you purchase these players.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, lots of features for the price. Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and streams online content without skipping or buffering issues. My only gripe is that it does not have a indicator light on front panel to let you know if it's on. Other than that, it's an excellent addition to any entertainment setup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hoflich

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED!
customer_reviews.text: Another great Samsung product! Only flaw is there is no power light, or indication that the system is on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Valicia

customer_reviews.title: This unit works great, it plays my TV series DVDs and is ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great, it plays my TV series DVDs and is vey easy to operatte, small and light -weight, but with all high quality aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!!  My bad!!!  Blu Ray works great!
customer_reviews.text: Our Blu Ray player is working great!! We had an electrical issue on that entire side of our house.
customer_reviews.author: Wbevie

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these that do not have the WIFI and they have worked well. This one, purchased in May, dead in October. Will not spin up the disc. Should have bought the 3 year warentee from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda K. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Needed adapter.
customer_reviews.text: Needed adapters to match older surround sound receiver but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Avalane

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 6/7/18. While watching Netflix, blacked out and will not turn back on. After 6 months, it is garbage and our daughter's favorite Disney movie is stuck in it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for both blueray and dvd disks. Like most reviews it would be nice to have a led light in the front of the unit to let you know that it is on, but, that is the only thing I can say could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Sibenaller

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Like that it now just keeps playing. Instead of playing one episode and ha ing to restart it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Knight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Loved thebease of setting it up and works great with other streamingn services
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Samsung smart Blu-ray player purchased in 18 months. Unfortunately, I liked the features, but they just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Albertkitten66

customer_reviews.title: Dvd
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months it lost connection to router every time I turn it on I have to reconnect to my internet. But all my other devices work.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install & use! Literally “plug & play”! Lightweight & small.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only 2 years of very little use. Cannot stream Disney +
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Through no fault of Amazon this item stinks. If you are hoping to play DVD's, forget it. I tried over 200 DVD's in a did not play any of them. I like the other features of the suydam but I HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND this.
customer_reviews.author: Theta Sigma

customer_reviews.title: No lights to help or know what's going on.
customer_reviews.text: Player failed just after warranty. Will not play or load after approx 15 hours of use. When it worked it was fine, but after time it would get stuck in middle of playing. Now it won't even load a DVD. Always bought Samsung but never again. It is a total piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: KLM MEX

product_meta.title: Samsung Blu-ray DVD Disc Player with Built-in Wi-Fi 1080p & Full HD Upconversion, Plays Blu-ray Discs, DVDs & CDs, Plus CubeCable 6Ft High Speed HDMI Cable, Black Finish
product_meta.description: Samsung Blu-ray DVD disc player with built-in Wi-Fi the Blu-ray Disc player from Samsung is designed for high-definition movie playback and streaming multimedia content. This Blu-ray player supports full HD 1080P Blu-ray Disc playback from its HDMI output, and can also up-converts standard Definition DVDs to near HD quality. Integrated single-band Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity allows you to access Free and subscription-based streaming content such as YouTube and Netflix. built-in Wi-Fi with built-in Wi-Fi, you can access all your smart Blu-ray features and apps wirelessly. Sync and stream content to other devices as well, such as PCs, smartphones, tablets and cameras using Samsung all share content sharing technology built-in apps for streaming discover more entertainment and enjoy streaming services from built-in content partners and Opera TV apps for streaming music, movies, TV shows and morehd up conversion with HD Up conversion, non-HD video is automatically enhanced to bring it to near-HD quality. anynet+control up to twelve compatible devices and streamline Your device management by using a single remote control usb get complete access to stored audio and video files from any USB memory drive or external hard drive hdmi connect your TV and audio systems for high quality audio and an enhanced entertainment experience when watching your favorite movies, shows and sports Dolby digital Plus & Dolby True hdoptimizes the TV sound quality when viewing and listening to internet movies, Internet music and other content played back from wired or wireless mobile phones, PCs and tablet devices input/output connectors1x HDMI output1x digital coaxial audio output1x USB 2. 0 input1x Ethernet.
feature_bullets: Full HD 1080p playback via HDMI - this Blu-ray player supports full HD 1080p Blu-ray Disc playback from its HDMI output

Built-in Wi-Fi - with built-in Wi-Fi, you can access all your smart Blu-ray features and apps wirelessly. Sync and stream content to other devices as well, such as PCs, smartphones, tablets and cameras using Samsung all share content sharing Technology
Dvd upscaling to near HD quality - with HD Up conversion, non-HD video is automatically enhanced to bring it to near-HD quality. You can watch your favorite DVD movies with greater detail and clarity
Hdmi - connect your TV and audio systems for high quality audio and an enhanced entertainment experience when watching your favorite movies, shows and sports
Front panel USB port - connect your TV and audio systems for high quality audio and an enhanced entertainment experience when watching your favorite movies, shows and sports
